---
title: FieldMissingNullable
summary: Fields that can be null should be annotated @Nullable
layout: bugpattern
tags: ''
severity: SUGGESTION
---

## The problem


## Suppression
Suppress false positives by adding an `@SuppressWarnings("FieldMissingNullable")` annotation to the enclosing element.
